function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Cities known for adopting technology and innovation","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to high population density and frequent travel","Mitigation":"Implement strict health and safety protocols, increase healthcare infrastructure, and promote vaccination campaigns","Technologies":"IoT for contact tracing, AI for predictive analysis of disease spread, and telemedicine for remote healthcare","People":"Residents, travelers, and visitors in the city","Owner":"Local governments and healthcare authorities"},{"Description":"Pre-existing infrastructure in cities","Impact":"Rapid spread of contagious diseases due to interconnected systems and high population density","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance of infrastructure, implementation of health monitoring systems, and public health education programs","Technologies":"Smart city infrastructure for health monitoring, IoT for environmental monitoring, and AI for predictive modeling","People":"Residents, workers, and visitors in the city","Owner":"City governments and infrastructure authorities"}]}
